tool_description: Independent tracks with label numbers. Daily updating stats, weekly updating songs
title: Indie Songs : DistroKid & Unsigned

api_list.name: Get songs with ALL metadata and stats (play counts)
api_list.description:
Get all tracks with full metadata including recent Spotify play counts.

Also Apple song URL, Spotify song URL, Composer name, ISRC, Label, Release date, Genres, Apple IDs, Spotify IDs are included.

api_list.name: Get Top 50 indie songs
api_list.description: Get TOP 50 indie songs based on their daily stream increase ratio
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indie-songs-distrokid-unsigned.p.rapidapi.com/tracks/top50/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indie-songs-distrokid-unsigned.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get CSV of Top 50 Indie Songs
api_list.description: Get TOP 50 indie songs by their daily stream increase in a CSV format using URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indie-songs-distrokid-unsigned.p.rapidapi.com/tracks/top50/csv2"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indie-songs-distrokid-unsigned.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
